An educational solution that integrates learning, certified assessment, and employability into a single ecosystem for higher education institutions Learning Assessment Employability Show more Three Pillars Richmond print and digital content Internationally recognized Assessment and Certification Center Preparation for the professional world and certification as a competitive advantage Our Ecosystem Richmond Content Print Content Richmond content is aligned with international standards and designed to integrate with recognized assessments, supporting a smooth transition from the classroom to the professional world Digital Content Richmond content is aligned with international standards and designed to integrate with recognized assessments, supporting a smooth transition from the classroom to the professional world Assessment Center & Certification Advanced assessment and progress monitoring tool aligned with international standards It provides continuous evaluations, and certification simulations, ensuring effective learning and measurable outcomes such as: Targeted assessments: Listening and Reading Detailed feedback: Identifies

title: Richmond Pro
content: progress monitoring tool aligned with international standards It provides continuous evaluations, and certification simulations, ensuring effective learning and measurable outcomes such as: Targeted assessments: Listening and Reading Detailed feedback: Identifies strengths and areas for improvement Customized reports: Advanced analytics for institutions and educators Simulations: Practical preparation for exams like TOEIC® Professional Development ED Community is a virtual hub for English language teachers, where they can learn, share, and grow together Our online community offers micro-courses on key topics such as student motivation, educational technology, and new approaches to teaching grammar and vocabulary Teachers can explore methods, strategies, and tools for virtual learning At the end of each course, they complete a questionnaire to assess their understanding and, upon passing, receive a micro-certification Educational Technology & AI Richmond Studio is a place where you can easily learn English with access to thousands of resources of all Richmond Pro learning contents English
